name: ClueFinders 3rd Grade Adventures: Mystery of Mathra
name_original: ClueFinders 3rd Grade Adventures: Mystery of Mathra
description:
ClueFinders 3rd Grade Adventures: Mystery of Mathra is an educational adventure game developed by The Learning Company. It was originally released in 1998. It was published by The Learning Company. The game is rated as "Exceptional" on RAWG.
ClueFinders 3rd Grade Adventures: Mystery of Mathra is available on PC.
